What, as per you, is the role of developing and emerging countries in reviving the current global economic conditions?

 Introduction

India as a developing country is facing many economic problems. As per the recent survey poverty,corruption,child labour,etc. are the main reasons for decline in the economy of the developing countries like India. If the economy of any country is increased or decreased it will show affect on global economy. So, economy of one country can affect the economy of the whole world.

 Role of developing and emerging countries

First and foremost thing that should be taken into consideration is corruption. In corruption the money is used for the individual growth not for the domestic or global growth. Corruption can lead to poverty because in corruption only some people are growing and other groups like poor are becoming more poor. As per the ISO,the povery in India is increased by twenty percent compared to other countries and this is the main thing that is affecting the Indian economy. It is estimated that there will be increase in povery in near future. 

In recent past, rupee value has been declined . RBI had taken certain measures to combat the decline in the value of rupee.In near future if these measures are not followed there are more chances for decline in rupee value and which in turn affects the domestic and global  developement.

Conclution

Certain measures should be taken by the individual and the government to increase the economy of the India eradication of poverty,corruption,etc. So,that it can lead to increase in the domestic as well as global economy.
